section_title.subTitle: About Us.
section_title.title: Nurul-Yateem Foundation is passionately devoted to orphanage and children's welfare, fostering a lasting legacy of compassion and empowerment in the lives of countless young ones in need.

content1: We are committed to children's welfare, fostering a legacy of compassion and empowerment. Our dedication nurtures and empowers those in need, providing the support and opportunities they deserve.
